name: comraddi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqtri(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2), co(c2, caddc, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2))
-| wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1))
-| wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2))
-| wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1))
-| wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c2))
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2))
-| wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1))
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)

comment: Commute RHS addition. See ~ addcomli to commute addition on LHS. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 11-Oct-2018.)
